abstract: News Analysis; Pres Obama, visiting US destroyer Ross in Rota, Spain, remarks on his approach and thoughts about leading a nation at war; reporter at news conference notes Obama would be first two-term president to have been at war every day in office.
snippet: “What I’ve been trying to do is to create an architecture, a structure,” for an American approach to military operations, the president said, “and it’s not there yet.”...

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: “What I’ve been trying to do is to create an architecture, a structure,” for an American approach to military operations, the president said, “and it’s not there yet.”

headline.main: Obama on ‘Brooding’ Over the Interminable Wars of His Presidency
headline.print_headline: Years In, a War Footing Obama Still Finds Slippery
